titles.title: Calling for the restoration of power-sharing in Northern Ireland.
Calling for the restoration of power-sharing in Northern Ireland.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: This resolution calls on the government of the United Kingdom to employ its influence to end the obstruction of Northern Ireland's devolved governmental institutions by the Democratic Unionist Party and restore power-sharing in Northern Ireland as set out in the Good Friday Agreement. The resolution also calls on all participants of the Good Friday Agreement to honor their obligations under the agreement.
